32 bit gen '3UWD298Z7VL5ZX4393C781T3GWYL06LFWXRYWP0VHSURD3LQW8LCXZW7Z'  Doubt it will work though, since you need to patch the memory.  

ALSO, fix for the KEYGEN.  There is a design flaw with the actual keygen.  When you paste into the box, it does not remove the 'Paste Authentification here' text when you put in the request code. 

Ensure that you clear the box entirely when entering the request code!!!  

Was pissing me off until i noticed that it said "Paste" still after the last letter in my request code! 

Hope this helps you guys!

do NOT download this piece of shit!
The crack is just a virus 
(Trojan.Win32.Agent.204288.FB), and the REST is just the free trial you can get from Autodesk website direct download and virus free!

  Even though AVG supposedly quarantined the infection .. it still got through, because it overwrote my boot sector / GRUB.
 After restoring grub - when I dual boot into windows it just overwrites GRUB again.
 Basically it has destroyed my windows installation and I'm only left with Linux.

Thank you so much! For those who can't get the keygen to work, first after disabling UAC reboot your computer, and then make sure that all the spaces in the request code is deleted before clicking Generate. Again, thanks for such a great torrent!
